```go
m := md5.New() 
io.WriteString(m, strings.ToLower(user.Email())) 
userId := fmt.Sprintf("%x", m.Sum(nil)) 
authCookieValue := objx.New(map[string]interface{}{ 
  "userid":      userId, 
  "name":       user.Name(), 
  "avatar_url": user.AvatarURL(), 
  "email":      user.Email(), 
}).MustBase64() 

```
